website_summaries.verdict: Its soft construction makes it fit under beds easily, allowing you to keep extra clothes and bedding without taking needed space elsewhere.
pros: You can see your stored items through the clear top
The bags are sealed with a zipper, keeping unwanted dirt and bugs away from your belongings
Even better, the seams are reinforced, so you can load the bags without worrying about the bags splitting
Since it isn't rigid like a plastic box, it can mold to most spaces
cons: What you gain in flexibility from its soft sides, you lose in strength

customer_reviews.title: These bags were delivered yesterday and have already ripped. ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags were delivered yesterday and have already ripped. The material is extremely thin and with no effort, I managed to rip not one but both of these bags while adding my winter clothes into them. You may be thinking "maybe she packed them too full?" Unfortunately, with little in each bag I've had one handle rip while trying to move one bag and the plastic top to ripped at the seams on the other when gently unfolding the bag to use them for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: MIchela Gaviorno

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but not always "one pair per hole" so be careful.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice shoe solution for your closet. One important thing to note is that the little cubbies will hold a pair of shoes IF they are very collapsible. Heels (probably no higher than 2.5") and Keds and flip flops all work. Your running shoes will NOT and you will need two cubbies, one for each shoe. I ordered two of these things so fortunately had enough space but don't be caught by surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Alboum

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective, and collapsable.
customer_reviews.text: So - the size is perfect and it will serve the purpose I wanted (storing some old blankets both under a bed and along the top of a closet, protected from dust) quite well. The only point I'd note is that I assumed it might have some kind of collapsible bracing (for lack of a better term) on the inside, but no - it's simply held in place by the contents you put inside. Not an issue for my purposes, but worth noting that you shouldn't expect/require rigidity.
customer_reviews.author: theIntrovertedObserver

customer_reviews.title: Not the best under bed storage option
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 3 stars because I ended up using it for a purpose other than I intended to purchase it for. The size and dimensions are all accurate, however, the sides are all a soft fabric with absolutely no firmness and do not maintain their shape or stand up. To get them to stand up you either need to line them with some type of cardboard OR stuff the containers with whatever you plan in storing. We intended to use them for storing extra shoes under the bed, but then don't slide in and out without completely losing shape so the contents do not stay organized.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Griffin Jr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I use this for clothing, as opposed to blankets etc. I live in a small, old, duplex apartment, with very littl closet, and/or storage space. I decided to store my items under my bed, but I didn’t want to just leave them lying on the carpet. These underbed bags are (in my opinion) perfect for that. They fit perfectly under the bed, and are the right size to allow for even storage. I was surprised to get two for this price as well. They, obviously, aren’t made of the BEST material in the world, but they do exactly what I needed them to. If you are in a similar position to myself, buy them. You’ll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Caffrey

customer_reviews.title: Underbed Storage Bag Comparison: Whitmor is the One!
customer_reviews.text: Have now ordered twice. Our house is more cluttered than we care to admit so we also tried another more expensive brand that was awful--poor zippers and flimsy construction. Beyond the fantastic price, these from Whitmor are great, confidence inducing and cavernous. At at height of seven inches, they will fit under most bed frames. . Space is at a premium and these under the bed organizers are a great idea. At under $8 for a set of two, this deal was almost too good to be true and quality is impressive. Feeling quite zippy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: good for under bed storage
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with these storage bags for many reasons and found only a few drawbacks. what I love... the tremendous amount of items I can store in EACH bag... Being able to see whats in the bag from the clear top.. These seem really well made! what I do NOT like... these are not very easy to move under a bed I highly recommend these for storage anywhere you need them. They will help organize and store with little dust etc. from getting in and when not in use they fold down to a very small package.
customer_reviews.author: Wil Sweatt

customer_reviews.title: NO support/stiffness to this bag
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really like these. Purchased to hold extra linens to stash under the bed but it lacks ANY kind of support. Basically it’s a rectangular soft flimsy cloth/plastic bag with zipper. It does hold a lot, I have two king size fleeces folded into one. I just wish the walls were sturdy and stayed up when not fully filled. If you don’t care about stiffness then it’s fine to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Can Not Hold Shoes
customer_reviews.text: So we hung this thing up a few days ago and just today I decided to fill it with shoes. It can hold 12 pairs, right? I put in -3 pairs of slippers -1 pair of flip flops -4 pairs of converse -1 pair of heels None of these shoes are very heavy. On that pair of heels, however, the metal bent in a closed door and came out. The shoe holder fell, the metal hooks all bent, and the metal damaged the top if my door. If you're going to buy this, plan to hang it on your wall with screw in hooks or it WILL bend and fall when you try to use even 2/3 of it's space.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Drass

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite design.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the looks and quality of this under bed storage bag, but it has a design flaw that annoys me. I need to get into these bags often, and there are not two zipper heads, meaning that I have to unzip the entire bag to get something out of it from the far side of the zipper. I know, it sounds picky, but the other two bags I have I can keep zipped from the center, and can then easily remove an item from one side or the other. Darn it. If this doesn't bother you, then I would recommend this bag for its quality.
customer_reviews.author: Everyday Kay

customer_reviews.title: Good size and will do the job!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to store blankets and sheets under our beds after moving into a smaller place. Two of these will fit great under a size full or larger mattress. I don't think you could fit both under a twin, however. I would say the material and zipper is not the best quality, however will work just fine if you are storing stuff and not using it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Handles are not secure even with the minimual weight
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed. I purchased two packages. I put two queen size quilts I had finished in one bag. And, baby clothes for my soon to be granddaughter (newborn to 3 month old) in another. The baby clothes one, the handles came right off, but not the quilt one. The quilt one was over twice the weight. I do not recommend due to the inconsistency of the construction
customer_reviews.author: Lily Pad

customer_reviews.title: Not for men
customer_reviews.text: I am a guy with a size 11.5 shoe. Only a single shoe will fit in each cubby. You think "yay 10 pairs of shoes up and out on the way", nope only five pair. Also anything taller than a sneaker won't fit at all.
customer_reviews.author: Morsey Gatustrid

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product
customer_reviews.text: Very, very flimsly as stated in other reviews. Unless you plan on reinforcing this with thick cardboard or something to help this poor product help keep its shape you will be disappointed when trying to move then around when retrieving items. You folded your clothes or other items nicely and placed them in here for quick storage access? Ha ha, think again. There is no structural support to speak of. Everything you just folded will now be misshapen and mangled from trying to move this sad storage product around. Save yourself time and money and don't buy this. Buy something that actually has structure. A cardboard box would do better and not cost you $15.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money, the product is super cheap. I purchased for additional clothing storage under my bed, and its a total joke. The bags have no structure to them, its like throwing your clothes into large clear trash bag. Save your money and purchase elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: kG

customer_reviews.title: It's not sturdy but i knew it wouldn't be - GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to store my thick/bulky sweaters and this is exactly what I needed, great product and great price for a set of two! It's not sturdy because it's a storage BAG not a container this works for me because I already have some items stored underneath and wanted to squeeze this in between. it worked out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Crafty

customer_reviews.title: THEY FIT SO MUCH STUFF!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are Awesome! they fit soooo much! I have 3 closets full of clothes and I was able to fit everything in 4 of these bags. they are nice when moving because they have a clear top so you can see inside. I used these when I was moving and once I was finished moving my stuff, I stored clothes, sheets, towels, and shoes I don't currently wear but might in another season and stored these in the garage. they keep everything clean and sealed. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but not very well made.
customer_reviews.text: These are a really nice idea. They fold flat & small when not in use. One of them tore the first time we put some things in it and tried to move it. It was not full, but the plastic top tore away from the side. The sad part is that it tore on my daughter while she is up at camp. So she had to try to tape it all back up so her stuff wouldn't all fall out. Might be ok if you just put a couple things in it and dont have to carry them very far. All she did was carr them from her car to her cabin and it ripped.
customer_reviews.author: DZKimmi

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: These were better than I expected for the low price. I order 2 packs of 2 but really fit everything I wanted in only 1 bag! They are much larger than I expected and held way more than I expected without really stuffing it. Fit under bed nicely and love the side handles that makes it easier to pull them out when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and just not for me
customer_reviews.text: These zippered storage bags are flimsy and feel cheaply made. One of my two bags arrived with a defective zip closure. The storage size is decent, but honestly will not buy fabric material to use for storage again... keep in mind if you have animals too dust/pet hair from under your bed cling to these bags.
customer_reviews.author: HeyNae

customer_reviews.title: Great vented mesh product for storage/shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like that material is fabric type mesh, so it is vented. The pockets are large enough to hold men's size 11 shoes, and I generally like dark brown/coffee color. The hooks are very skinny, so not very noticeable on outside face of the door. My closet door is very tight/flush with door frame, so I took a drill bit and shaved the door just a bit, so that door closes smoothly. I bought two. The second one wall mounted with couple of screws in dead corner behind furniture for my wife's shoes.
customer_reviews.author: ghalib manjurr

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot, just don’t use the handles!
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers wrote, I was amazed by the amount of clothing I could get into these bags (more than one large plastic bin/bag). I like the breathable, but thin, fabric. Since we have hardwood floors, it was easy for me to push down on the clothing and slide it under our bed. The only negative, which I knew about from other reviews, is the weak handles. Of the four bags, one bag’s handles completely tore off when I went to pick it up. By picking up the bags at the corners, instead of using the handles, the other three bags have remained intact.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver.
customer_reviews.text: I got 4 bags (2 sets of 2) and fit them all under a queen bed. It cleared out my closet beautifully and got all the piles of clothes out of my way. I imagine I'll need to be gentle with them, but they work great and look great.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Cheap quality. Seams came apart.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE- Still horrible. Continued to rip apart. What a pain. ORIGINAL-I purchased this because of the reviews. However, there is a hole in one of the bags. The material seam is coming apart. It’s only a matter of time before the whole thing comes apart. Won’t purchase again and don’t recommend this to anyone. Not worth $12. ((((
customer_reviews.author: Darya

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as I would like but good price
customer_reviews.text: These were a great price but when full of clothes they are not very durable. One of the two I filled ripped apart while I was carrying it to store it. They do fit very nicely under the bed if you are looking for storage options. Would not recommend carrying by the handles when it is full.
customer_reviews.author: S. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: Though I had to wait a VERY long time for them (like even longer than I was told when I originally placed the order), they were WELL worth the wait!! I was a little nervous when a tiny package arrived.. I planned to put scarves in one (I work for a scarf company, so I have A LOT) and sweaters in the other (I live in NYC so I have A LOT of these too).. but there was no need to worry. It's AMAZING how much I was able to fit in them. I rarely write reviews, but had to share how great these are. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Candice H

customer_reviews.title: Soft-sided bags
customer_reviews.text: These are soft sided, but they appear sturdy. They hold quite a bit. However, in sliding them under the bed, they drag on the underside of the mattress and on the carpet, so everything is the bags is mooshed and twisted. They are not hard sided, so your items will be crushed. For some reason, my bed is very low and I had a hard time pushing them under the bed. I guess I was expecting a little more substance than a large plastic bag with a zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: If you have carpet it is impossible to get then to slide under the bed. Overall very poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Cloth shoe holders won't tear like plastic ones. If you have sandals or flats, one pocket will hold 2 shoes. Very sturdy but light weight. I moved recently and the movers lost all my shoe racks. Thought I would try this method instead of replacing the racks. Now my closet is clutter free (shoe freak here) and my shoes are out of sight. I have 2 of these, may get another. Note: I have 2 linen closets and these fit on the inside of the door without interfering with the shelves. Very happy with purchase. If you have children, great way to hide small toys out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh A. Delany

customer_reviews.title: Not structured
customer_reviews.text: So this one might be on me, but I thought these would have some structure but they are really just bags. We got them to store vinyl records under our bed but it's just not sturdy enough. We lined the bottom with cardboard and that helped. Other then that, they seem nice, the zipper works and the plastic on top is clear, rather then some cheap stuff which ends up tinted.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Becker

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke on first use and not effective for storage
customer_reviews.text: These have no shape or integrity, so they wad up when you try to put them under the bed. The zipper on the first one I bought broke the first time I used it and the second one soon after. Will have to throw them away because now all my stuff gets dust bunnies on it.
customer_reviews.author: AP NYC

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to tear
customer_reviews.text: My bed is pretty low to the ground. the frame rubs against the bags every time its placed back under the bed i feared it would rip but it hasn't yet. kind of flimsy prior to filling the bag nice to help save space with unwanted seasonal blankets etc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am using it for my kids stuff under their bed. It’s a great for storage but not as sturdy as I thought they would be. Just got them so I can’t say how long they will hold up. I like that you can see through it so you know what is in them.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Allen

customer_reviews.title: A proper price would be around 0.25¢. Real bad
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using the product for about 2 weeks and the zippers completely broken. I only had some bags and hats in it and it wasn’t even full but the plastic broke apart from the zipper, and the slider fell off the track. when i fixed the slider, it started breaking off the other side of the zipper. After the slider broke, even after i had tried fixing it the zipper would come apart at weird points along the bag, spots that weren’t even close to anything in the bag. There was no strain but the zipper would still seperate.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I’m renting my room to someone for a few months, and needed storage bags for my bed things. Although I can imagine why zippers might come apart with these bags, none of the 4 bags I ordered have any issues. Make sure that you don’t overstuff the bags - 4 cotton pillows fit in 1 bag, but no more. If your bedroom has carpeting, the plastic side slides smoothly under your bed.
customer_reviews.author: BaldwinSmithie

customer_reviews.title: Short Term Solution
customer_reviews.text: These are obviously cheap material and are not made to last. They fix short-term storage issues. BUT THEY DO THEIR JOB. I needed a place for my shoes and they fit almost all of them under the bed pretty nicely. (I have a lot of shoes). For women's size 9-10, I put about 16-18 shoes in each one. It depends how many boots or flats you own that determine how many shoes you can put in each one. They do not have hard edges so you can adjust and use the space as needed. I recommend these for apartment living and/or any small temporary small space living.
customer_reviews.author: Rabecca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: I use one of them to store wrapping paper and gift bags, I haven't used the other one yet. They fit perfectly under my bed, which isn't very high off the ground. I imagine they would rip easily if you pull on them with something heavy inside, so just be gentle when retrieving them from under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey M.

customer_reviews.title: Helping me tame my wild closet!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is great for my tiny closet - narrow and long and perfectly holds undergarments that I didn't want to use shelf space for. It feels sturdy to me, though I've only been using it a few weeks now so time will show. (Since I'm not using it for shoes, I am not sure how the wear and tear of something larger/heavier would change things.) The only issue I had was that the hooks to hang it on the bar in the closet are a bit small - they *just* fit over mine, and there'd be no way to slide it back and forth if that were my intention - luckily, it's not.
customer_reviews.author: HRW

customer_reviews.title: They worked well for a short time
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this item 3 stars because it did not hold up. Nope, not even for a year of use. The handles ripped off first and then the plastic top. Better to get 100% canvas if you can. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: By far best over the door rack
customer_reviews.text: This is the best solution for too many shoes. It is VERY VERY sturdy and not cheap. You can get a lot of shoes in them. I use it for my suit shoes and they fit perfectly. My wife can fit two shoes in one container.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe rack! It's not too wide, which works perfectly for hanging on my closet door and the pouches are spacious. I like the color of the fabric used for making said shoe rack and it really suits my storage needs. My ONLY complaint is that it didn't give tracking information to tell you the current status of its delivery route. For example, when you look at the order details and it might say that the 'package has arrived at a carrier facility'. (The word 'only' is in all capital letters for emphasis; I am not yelling)
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Good amount of storage space
customer_reviews.text: I got these to store my Christmas garland/greenery. The sides are a bit of a nuisance since they don’t stand up while you’re trying to fit items in, but once you load them up they are easily zipped and fit right under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: pamela dipzinski

customer_reviews.title: Not rigid at all
customer_reviews.text: Typically these types of containers have plastic inserts to make the sides rigid but these do not come with anything like that. I was planning on being able to stack them on top of one another but that isn't going to work unless I cut up some cardboard to try and make the sides solid. Seem to be decently made and suited well for my purposes otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Heather O

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced - Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These are ridiculously over priced. They have no structure, the zippers are cheap. No more than $4 in materials to make these. Also, the plastic ripped while I was pushing the bag under the bed.. PUSHING, not pulling it out. I would have returned them but the package arrived late and I was strapped for time.
customer_reviews.author: MBENDA

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time purchase of this product. The first one was 4 years ago. Very good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a cleaning supply organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I have a criminally small cleaning closet with only 1 top shelf. It was a disaster! I saw this on Pinterest and immediately bought it to put my cleaning supplies in. It works perfectly for that. It has plenty of pockets and the fabric/color make it look classier than if I had gotten clear or anything else. Can't recommend this enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Just brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Pretty steady shoe rack, I hang it over my closet door and the hooks fit perfectly after a little bending here and there, all done by hand, no tools required whatsoever. The pockets are deep enough that my shoes fit more than halfway in so they are stable and don't wobble about or fall out when I open the closet. This has made my life a lot easier with organizing my shoes, every time I take a pair off, I immediately put it back in, my room is 10X less messy.
customer_reviews.author: Silly_me

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find an extra-long set of underbed bags but these have no structure. They are basically rectangular duffle bags. I'd return but I waited too long to open them up to realize they wouldn't work and am now stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but are OK
customer_reviews.text: I am excited to maximize the storage under my bed but these are a bit flimsy. Other storage bags I got had sturdy ridged sides so they were easier to slide and fill. These have no support and seem a bit “cheap”
customer_reviews.author: R. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Things are stored well
customer_reviews.text: I love the length and size of this product but I thought it would be more sturdy. It kind of reminded me of shoving your stuff in a pillow case and under the bed it went. If there was some support at least on the sides or even bottom I would rate it higher.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna

customer_reviews.title: Great for under the bed storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for under the bed storage as I just moved into a one bedroom apt with my boyfriend (and we only have one closet, yikes), and these were perfect. Super lightweight, the material itself is a little thin/flimsy but it's perfect for sweaters and summer shoes/sneakers. Bigger than I expected, plus since it's a fabric material you can stretch it's limits a little. If you have hardwood floors, they slide well so it's easy to get them under and out from underneath the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: 😇Wow!”Want more” “Whitmor”
customer_reviews.text: Whitmor to me is like a play-on of words and I mean it in a good way because it is definitely everything that it has claimed and “with Whitmor I want more” and when I am able to financially to get another set I am and I was pleasantly surprised by how much I can get into it and my first Impression when delivered was concern about it because the package was so flat but once I opened the package my concern quickly melted away and I am very happy customer thank you Cherebu58
customer_reviews.author: Cherebu61

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The organizers are not the best quality .. the zipper seems a little flimsy, but they worked perfect for my needs. I was able to store about 10 pairs of boots / booties in each bag and stored them under my bed ! boxes take up a lot of space, so these were lifesavers
customer_reviews.author: LizardBear

customer_reviews.title: Bought a Second
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit difficult to get too excited about something like an over the door organizer, but the high praise I can give to this is that I liked it enough I've purchased a second. I use one in my entry coat closet to organize gloves, scarfs, hats, etc., and the other in my laundry/mud room to keep our muddy/yard work/dog walking shoes organized and out of sight. My husband wears a size 12 and they fit snugly. My only complaint is that it wish it were sold with hardware to hang from one side of the door because the hooks hanging over the exterior look a bit tacky. I took care of this myself using command hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and inexpensive shoe organizer.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected. It is not made of super high quality material by any means but I expected that considering how low the price was. I was looking for a product that I could hang on my door and put my shoes in. This meets my needs and I can now walk into my closet. It makes it easier to get ready in the morning because I can find my shoes very quickly. I will likely be buying more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: HR

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe bag.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe hanger is great. Each slot holds a pair of women's shoes easily. There are pockets on the outside of the shoe bag as well. Sturdy, streamlined, good hanging system.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a few years now. The hooks at the top do leave marks on whatever door you hang them on, but it depends on how heavy your shoes are. I've got about 10 pairs hanging now and the weight of the shoes have caused the hooks to bend and makes it harder for them to sit flush on the top of the door. The fabric however, has held up well and I even bought one for my niece. It works as advertised, but you should probably get a different set of hooks if you want to hang many shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bull

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY! These underbed bags are HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! Yes it's NOT sturdy, look as if mistreated the zipper will break, but for less than $8 you can't expect more. I was able to put 4 King size sheet sets (8 sheets) 6 bath towels and a King size comforter to fit comfortably. I will definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Watch sizing not big enough
customer_reviews.text: You have to really watch it the description of the size was a little confusing hey there how are you thank you you too wound up having to send back cuz it wasn't big enough
customer_reviews.author: jody

customer_reviews.title: Don't hold shape and rip if anything heavy is stored inside
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for something to store pillows or light clothes these are probably fine. For me I tried to use them as more general storage and they ripped the moment more than some light clothes worth of weight were placed inside. Also they don't have with any cardboard or anything to help keep it's shape, making it fairly unwieldy to move in and out from under our bed. Overall, they may work for some but for me I'm going back to plastic tubs.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: These are an inexpensive option, but not long term option
customer_reviews.text: These were some of the least expensive ones we found. They work well considering the price. Zippers are not 100% best ones I've seen, but for the price they are adequate. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing Nut

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Our Needs
customer_reviews.text: This is our3shoe saver. We recently moved and there aren't that many closets...so I purchased another one (have two already) with only 2 closets we needed more floor space for our shoes. I ordered this one and hubby shoes didn't quite fill all of the holders. So mine did and I'm going to have to order two more. It makes the closet a lot neater without having shoes on the floor. Also it put your shoes right in front of you. That is what I really nice. It fits over the door (there is a shoe organizer on the front of the door, so when the door closes it is inside the closet) and one on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Minerva BryantTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: They tore pretty easily once they were full. The material quality isn't good enough for their size and how much they hold. I put bedding and clothing in mine and the first time I had to pull one out from under the bed, the fabric where the handle attaches ripped wide open. So either put very little in them or don't put them on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Im pleased with these bags
customer_reviews.text: While this has no structure, I can tell that this is one of the sturdier underbags ive used before. Overall I was able to get half of my closet full of fall/winter gear (w/o hangers) to fit in here. Even while carrying the bag using the straps, it never felt like they would snap. We'll see how many usages I can get out of this but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Hall

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like these I wish that they were a little more sturdy but when they are full of items they make it easy for moving around and can fit in small places for easy storage
customer_reviews.author: Venus Casares

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product and delivery
customer_reviews.text: The product itself works just as you would expect for a guy with a small collection of shoes (8 pairs). Out of the bag it is a little crumpled up but as soon as you throw a few shoes into the slots it come out looking great. A definite buy for any young 24 year old who needs more space in his/her room. As a side note, the delivery was expected on the 20th but instead showed up on the 9th! I was told this was cushion time but even so, amazon did a fantastic job in delivering the product.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Everything it says it is and more. I love that I can use the pockets for storing my shoes but also use the other pockets to store other things of mine like my suspenders and any other things. It's lightweight and the hooks don't prevent me from closing my closet door. I do wish the bags were a little bigger because my shoes to fit in them but it was a tight fit. Nonetheless I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: RJD64

customer_reviews.title: Quick way to get organized ( and maybe buy some more shoes)
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these since both of the people in my house have a thing for SHOES ! What a great investment for us. We filled them right up after quickly installing on the back of bedroom doors. I did not like the hooks that come with them , so I installed hooks on the back of solid wood doors. This non-woven fabric is very sturdy, very well constructed, and each pocket holds 1 shoe that can easily be a size 13 . All of mine are filled with tennis shoes , all size 13, and all fit very nicely with no sagging.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Best

customer_reviews.title: Measure appropriately
customer_reviews.text: Measure the inside window casing and purchase that size. The blinds will automatically come 1/2" smaller to fit appropriately in the window casing. Do not order smaller or they will be too small. Color, and quality are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: J' Gough

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I like this, helps me organize my shoes in my closet. Now they're not in heaps on the floor. Item of note: the compartments seem a bit small. 11" deep, 5" high, 5" wide. All my shoes are flat and they fit snugly in the compartments. I think if I had tall, wedge shoes they wouldn't fit. I did consider the fact that perhaps I'm not doing it right, so I'll keep working on finding the right configuration. Having said all that, I just ordered a second one because I like the way it looks and I like having my shoes more organizedl
customer_reviews.author: JeanP

customer_reviews.title: Ripped!!
customer_reviews.text: I put 3 blankets in it and package ripped when I wen to pick it up... not very durable... will request replacement or refund... UPDATE: was able to get replacement
customer_reviews.author: Rayne M

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, But May Work For Small Items
customer_reviews.text: Honestly these broke within the first 3 weeks I had them. The zipper is very cheap. It couldn’t hold the amount of clothing I had and even when I evenly distributed around the storage pack it was so flimsy. Ended up adding more clutter to my area. I still have them to keep my t-shirts in but not sure I’ll have them long.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: They’re not the most sturdy. If you’re going to be pushing a shoving them underneath the bed a lot- be careful. Material is not sturdy at all. For me- they get the job done and work well to store some extra off season clothing. I wouldn’t overstuff them though because I can see them ripping very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice for my shoes (womens size 6) and my husbands shoes (men's size 10). My husbands shoes are bigger, so each shoe has its own compartment. My shoes (from flip flops to heels) fit nicely...a pair in each pocket. My tennis shoes do need their own pockets. Definitely thinking of buying for our cleaning supplies, too. Instead of over the door, I bought command hooks. The hooks were too fat, so we used zip ties to attach the organizer to the hooks. It still looks good-ball caps are on the hooks, too.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Clapper

customer_reviews.title: Very Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a few of this product in order to pack away items that I do not use on the day to day like winter coats, extra towels, bedding etc. At first, I was very pleased because it wasn't heavy and it fit everything without being stretched out. Unfortunately, as soon as I tried to move it by using the handles, they both ripped. :( won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: stephania Etienne

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Stashed my extra winter blankets, sheets and a pillow in two of these and shoved them under the bed. Great solution to a shortage of storage cabinets. They come folded up very small but unfold into well made, substantial storage bags. I will buy two more to put seasonal clothing in.
customer_reviews.author: KittyMama

customer_reviews.title: Nothing more than plastic bags
customer_reviews.text: These definitely in the pictures appear to actually be able to stand up and supported, when in reality they're nothing more than flimsy bags. I wanted under the bed storage for a place to store underwear, socks, and pajamas, and was hoping to use these as a functional drawer or something I could pull out like a basket. Because they're so flimsy and not sturdy, they really don't work the way I was lead on to believe. They're bags, nothing more. I don't want these anymore and will probably just leave them in the basement. I wish I could have a refund. :\
customer_reviews.author: Sam Rasbornik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby shoes :(
customer_reviews.text: Save your money for a better shoe holder. Unless you have teenie tiny shoes. I would say anything larger than a size 9 would be pushing this poorly made organizer to its limits. Mine ripped within seconds. There is no "give" or wiggle room and the stitching came loose immediately. Luckily it was only $10. In the trash its gone and onto the next one
customer_reviews.author: JRW74

customer_reviews.title: If you have hard floors you might have better luck but these just ball up on carpet
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work well for under the bed as there is nothing rigid to keep the shape of these containers as you try to pull out or push back under the bed. Will put a thin sheet of plywood in our to make it work. If you have hard floors you might have better luck but these just ball up on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: MommaMacof2

customer_reviews.title: Large 3M hooks don't fit through gussets!
customer_reviews.text: Works for what I need it to work for! Previous reviews were correct regarding the over the door hooks not being ideal, so I also ordered the 3M Command Large Plastic Hooks. The hooks don't fit through the gussets, so I had a MacGyver moment and used zip ties to make larger loops. It's not the prettiest thing ever, but it's hidden inside a closet door and works just fine. My husband's shoes didn't fit very well, so it's mostly my shoes and I reserved the top row for his belts.
customer_reviews.author: kotx

customer_reviews.title: Thin clear plastic tops rip at the seam after first use
customer_reviews.text: Thin clear plastic tops rip at the seam after first use with just a few soft stuffed animals in the bags. Probs OK for very, very gentle use. do not stress seams at all or will split.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lipman

customer_reviews.title: Ok for certain size products ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a heavy duty tough product, however, used for storage of extra king sized comforter and second one for large blanket. Satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Codder

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted and for a nice price! The hooks are way better than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and for a nice price! The hooks are way better than the velcro. They look like they will be durable, hopefully they truly will be. I could fit my tennis shoes in here, though they were a snug fit. I just had to stick them in opposite ways so they rested heel to toe...like you'd find in a shoe box. ;) My boots don't fit, but I wasn't really expecting shoes with 4 inch high tops and 2 1/2 inch heels to fit. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: 2 Bags fit 24 PAIRS of sneakers, heels, wedges, and flats!
customer_reviews.text: I easily fit 12 pairs of shoes & heels in each bag. I even had room to throw in my flats on top and on the sides. Overall I stored about 30 pairs of shoes under my bed with these bags. This product is overall great for the price. They are a tiny bit flimsy but other than that they work great. I personally used them for my shoes and heels that I don’t use all the time. I don’t have a lot of space for shoes so this was really handy. Since it’s not so sturdy, you can squeeze it in places!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: they do the trick, until they rip, but would have liked them to have a hard frame
customer_reviews.text: they do the trick but would have liked them to have a hard frame. They are flimsy so if you do not have enough things to stuff in it it is a limp, droopy container.they ripped within days at the seams and it is not like I stuffed them either.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rack, Bad Hooker
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good in that it hold all my shoes (I'm male size 10-11(US)) and I definitely like that it is mesh so you can see your shoes and it lets them dry out if they get wet or sweaty. The only down side is the hooks it comes with. They hook on top of the door but they made it hard to close my door all the way because of this. Once I actually closed my door, it rubbed the paint off the frame. I ended up just getting Command Medium hooks and hanging it up that way- works like a charm. Besides that though, good price for a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Soft structures boxes
customer_reviews.text: Not expecting soft sided, but they are good quality. They hold a huge amount of clothing and fit nicely under the best. However, due to the soft side and lack of structure, they are hard to slide under the bed when full of clothes, everything sort of bunches up.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: So is there a weight limit on how much you ...
customer_reviews.text: So is there a weight limit on how much you can put in these?? So I loaded one of the storage containers up pushed it under the bed, went to use the handles to pull it where I wanted it and the handle ripped almost tearing into the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Lilstamac

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect under any bed!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It holds a lot of clothes stacked, towels, etc. It easily fits under any bed. It does not have a hard bottom so it is soft all around. If anyone is looking of a hard bottom on these, they don't have it although I'm sure one can be easily made with cardboard. It zips all around and does not have a plasticy (sp?) smell. I used it to store baby clothes under my daughter's mini crib and it fit perfectly and well hidden. It has little pulls on the side to help with pulling it out, etc. Good quality! Arrives in a folded bag with two underbed bags.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and easy over the door hanger
customer_reviews.text: The price was right for this over the door hanger. I bought it to hold other items besides shoes, such as charger cords, lint brushes, perfume bottles, and other little things that I didn't use often enough to warrant them "dresser top space." I used the bottom 2 rows for small shoes, like flats and loafers - and each pocket holds a pair of shoes pretty well. For my sneakers, each shoe fits nicely in their own pocket. I've been using it for about 4 months now, and it doesn't show and signs of wear/tear. The top of the hanger has 3 reinforced holes that come with 3 white metal hooks to attach over the door.
customer_reviews.author: Saldelmaz

customer_reviews.title: Show cubbies are comically small
customer_reviews.text: I could fit maybe one shoe in each of these cubbies. How hard would it have been to make each compartment wider? Way too small. Pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for what you pay for. They are unstructured though. It can be a little challenging sliding them under the bed because of this. Fortunately they won't have a lot of wear and tear under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: baaapower

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color & fit
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, holds alot of shoes, I bought two of these, one for the back of the door and one for the front. I love it. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: JKMudGirl

customer_reviews.title: Go to Bed and Bath or Walmart and see what they have first on display.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a skinny place in my closet that was going to waste. Very well made. Fit perfectly. The only negative was it floated when you used it. Which caused getting in to my little space and holding with both hands. Could be a little heavier and stiffer to access easier. Terrible hanger set up on top of unit. I donated mine.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie,Sebring,FL

customer_reviews.title: Nice.......
customer_reviews.text: Nice item for my work/dress shoes. I wish it came in different colors!! But it fits easily over my door, holds my shoes very well (I usually wear a variety of flats to work/play plus some canvas shoes and flip flops). I haven't tried anything too heavy in it yet but I think it would hold my tennis shoes well too. I wouldn't recommend this for long term with really heavy shoes or boots since that isn't really what it was made for, but it's perfect for my shoes and maybe even other items.......hummmmmmmmm challenge accepted!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I expected this product to come with sturdy sides that give it more of the box look like in the photo, but really they are just limp. Still holds a decent amount though
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ballet flats & sandles
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews said you couldn't fit shoes in the slot... I'm a 30 Y.O. female who works in an office; I have a lot of ballet flats I wear to work. This holds them no problem. I fit a pair in each slot. I even have some tennis shoes and I fit the pair in a slot. I haven't noticed anything I can't fit; with the exception of say boots, or wedges, etc. But sandles, flats, tennies, etc. works perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Sciortino

customer_reviews.title: Save your money on this crappy thing and buy the kind made of canvas
customer_reviews.text: This lasted only about a month before the pockets started pulling off at the sides. I'm not storing rocks or bricks in it, so it should do it's job and not fall apart. Save your money on this crappy thing and buy the kind made of canvas.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dee

customer_reviews.title: Wrapping paper ok, shoes not ok
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I thought would be. Had planned on using for my shoes under the bed. Didn’t slide well under the bed. Now using for wrapping paper in the attic.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Godbey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe organizer at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for all of my shoes. I doubt it would fit my boots, but I haven't tried. When I put it over my closet door, I noticed that the hooks were barely catching on the casing. So, I moved it to another door in my room and it works perfectly fine. I intend on buying another one of these for one of the kids 👍
customer_reviews.author: Eric Binnion

product_meta.title: Whitmor Zippered Underbed Bags Java Set of 2 Pieces
product_meta.description: Style:JUMBO UNDERBED BAGS S/2Whitmor's Underbed Bag is the perfect soft storage solution to keep your bedding or folded garments organized in a bag with breathable material, without losing visibility to the contents. It fits under most beds when full and it collapses to minimal space when empty. Use it for guest bedding, seasonal fabric rotations, or for any fabric storage need where organization and visibility is paramount, but space is limited. Whitmor is a 4th generation family-owned and operated business. Since 1946, Whitmor has been dedicated to bringing organization home by creating products that simplify everyday life. Ensuring that those products are built with integrity, value, and innovation is our commitment to you. And our promise is that we will always be here for you should you ever need us as we stand behind our product 100%. Whitmor customer service is available in English and Spanish Monday through Friday from 8am - 4:30pm CST. Call us and we will gladly assist you in your language.
feature_bullets: A clear vinyl top on the under bed storage bag provides easy visibility of contents
Zipper closure protects household items from dust, dirt, pests and other airborne particles
Built to last; bags have reinforced seams for additional strength and support
Unstructured body allows bag to be folded and put away when not in use
For storage of linens, blankets, sweaters, clothes and accessories
Features handles for easy accessibility and portability
Whitmor's Service Guarantee - we stand by our products, if you have any problems, contact us for help

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars3,485 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
